abstract: Treasury Secretary Timothy F. Geithner found Tuesday that vanity was the topic du jour at his appearance at the Securities Industry and Financial Markets Association’s conference in New York.
snippet: Treasury Secretary Timothy F. Geithner found Tuesday that vanity was the topic du jour at his appearance at the Securities Industry and Financial Markets Association’s conference in New York.
lead_paragraph: From Javier C. Hernandez, a DealBook colleague:

headline.main: For Geithner, the Wrinkles Aren’t Just in Finance
